location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 121 to Rawson Hart Boddam, President and Governor for the Public Department, Council at Bombay, from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter discusses a number of administrative and financial matters including recent arrivals and departures and the debt owed by the company to the Resident. The letter also discusses recent woollen sales.
